sentences.en: British educationalists are divided about how best to teach reading.
sentences.cn: 英国教育学家在如何以最佳方式教授阅读的问题上存在分歧。

sentences.en: He made it his crusade to teach children to love books.
sentences.cn: 他把教孩子们热爱读书当做自己的使命。

sentences.en: He offered to teach them water-skiing.
sentences.cn: 他主动提出教他们滑水。

sentences.en: He uses tapes of this program to teach English.
sentences.cn: 他用这个节目的录像带教授英语。

sentences.en: I'd be hard pushed to teach him anything.
sentences.cn: 我发觉很难教他什么东西。

sentences.en: If someone puts you down,you should teach him a lesson.
sentences.cn: 如果有人奚落你，你就应该教训教训他。

sentences.en: Members of the union will continue to teach their full timetables.
sentences.cn: 协会成员将继续教授所有课程。

sentences.en: Most religions teach you to be truthful and self-disciplined.
sentences.cn: 多数宗教教导人们要真诚和律己。

sentences.en: Most religions teach you to be truthful.
sentences.cn: 大部分宗教都教导人要诚实。

sentences.en: People did not teach their children to be wary of strangers.
sentences.cn: 过去人们不会教育孩子提防陌生人。

sentences.en: Peter offered to teach them water-skiing.
sentences.cn: 彼得主动提出教他们滑水。

sentences.en: Rarely do schoolteachers have leeway to teach classes the way they want.
sentences.cn: 鲜有学校老师可随心所欲地教书的情况。

sentences.en: She taught me fractions and counting.
She volunteered to teach in the school.
She was trying to teach him to play the guitar.
Teach them to voice their feelings.
sentences.cn: 训练他们敢于表达自己的感受。

sentences.en: That’ll teach you to be late!
The aim of discipline is to teach children to behave acceptably.
sentences.cn: 纪律的目的是教育儿童举止得体。

sentences.en: They teach managers to accept reversals as a fact of business life.
sentences.cn: 他们教给管理人员要将挫折视为生意上的平常事。

trans.tran_en: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information

trans.tran_cn: 教，讲授，使学会，使引以为戒
trans.tran_en: to give lessons in a school, college, or university, or to help someone learn about something by giving them information
